News.Title: Future news
News.Author: Matteo Ciman
News.Text: In the future we will have no money...help us...:)

News.Title: Website online
News.Author: Matteo Ciman
News.Text: The new website of the MobileWebLab group of the University of Padua is online!!!

News.Title: News di prova scaduta
News.Author: Matteo Ciman
News.Text: The project idea has been defined and we are ready to start...
